array.string: <b:t>To make blue-violet goo,</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">3 parts of blue goo</b:ot> <b:t>is needed for every</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">1 part of red goo.</b:ot> <b:t>What is the ratio of blue goo to red goo?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">3</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">1</b:ot>
<b:t>What is the ratio of red goo to blue goo?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">1</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">3</b:ot>
<b:t>There are</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">2 tubs of red goo.</b:ot> <b:t>How much blue goo is needed to make blue-violet goo?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">2</b:ot> <b:op op="x" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">3</b:ot> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="6">6</b:ot>
<b:t>There are</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">9 tubs of blue goo.</b:ot> <b:t>How much red goo is needed to make blue-violet goo?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">9</b:ot> <b:op op="x" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">1/3</b:ot> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="3">3</b:ot>
